translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼りになるで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can count on me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーーん……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm, what is that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士団が好機に沸き立ち、一気に押し込んでいく中。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the knights grew excited at the opportunity and pushed forward in one swift action.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵将を討ち取って一息ついたピッテンは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pitten, having taken down the enemy general and catching his breath,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くを行く旅の一団を目に留めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: noticed a traveling group moving in the distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様でしたな、王子」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well done, Your Highness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いの老人が、その脇に控えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old wizard stood by his side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニコペリ……お前、いつまで俺を王子と呼ぶ気だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nikoperi... how long do you plan to keep calling me 'prince'?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのうち俺がポロンの息子と間違われるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, people are going to mistake me for Poron's son."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒャッヒャッヒャ。すみませんな、王兄殿下。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyahyahya. Sorry about that, Brother King Duke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご幼少のみぎりからお仕えしておりますとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been at your service since your childhood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあいい。ここは任す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's enough. I'll leave this to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あちらの旅人ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are those travelers over there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしや、お知り合いで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could they be acquaintances of yours?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦友-ﾄﾓ-だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're comrades in arms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ランス様、誰かいらっしゃいますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... Lord Rance, someone is here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？　誰だ、あの金ぴか……金……んん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? Who is that golden... gold... hmm?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか、どっかで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, I feel like I've seen them somewhere before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってあれ、ピッテンさんじゃない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, isn't that Pitten-san!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの時に一緒だった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were together during the Helman affair!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「久しいな、大将」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's been a while, General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ……おぉ、覚えているぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... Oh, I remember you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金ぴかのホモ野郎ではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the golden flamboyant guy, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なにやら、誤解まで相変わらずのようだが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Seems like the misunderstanding persists as usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあいい。旅の道行きか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's that. Are you on a journey?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょいジフテリアまで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just up to Jiphteria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご無沙汰しとります、将軍はん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Long time no see, General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コパ帝国の都市長殿か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, you're the city mayor of the Copa Empire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと知己とは知らなかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't know you were acquainted with Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃこっちもや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Same here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ま、誰と知り合いでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, no matter who he knows,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスならもう驚かへんっちゅうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't be surprised if it's Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違いない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No doubt about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ。お前らこそ、知り合いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? Are you acquainted with each other?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おんなじ自由都市の、それなりの地位の人間やし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're from the same Free Cities and hold decent positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあご近所はん、てとこや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say we're neighbors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パランチョ王国の強さは有名やからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The strength of the Parancho Kingdom is famous, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の総隊長にピッテンはんを推す声も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were quite a few voices suggesting Pitten as commander-in-chief of the Free Cities Allied Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこうあったんやけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連合軍の長は各都市のしがらみのない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tradition is to appoint as leader of the allied force someone without ties to any of the cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵に就かせるというのが伝統でな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: usually a mercenary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺も剣ならともかく、政が絡む立場は御免でな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can handle a sword, but a political position is something I refuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いの事情が噛み合って、けっこうな事だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our situations have aligned well, which is quite fortunate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とまあ、当人がこの調子って事もあってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, considering how he is himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は副隊長さんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this time it's the deputy commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……」
「ピッテンだー！　やっほー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pitten! Hey there!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ま、誰と知り合いでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, no matter who he knows,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスならもう驚かへんっちゅうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't be surprised if it's Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違いない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No doubt about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ。お前らこそ、知り合いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? Are you acquainted with each other?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おんなじ自由都市の、それなりの地位の人間やし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're from the same Free Cities and hold decent positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあご近所はん、てとこや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say we're neighbors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パランチョ王国の強さは有名やからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The strength of the Parancho Kingdom is famous, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の総隊長にピッテンはんを推す声も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were quite a few voices suggesting Pitten as commander-in-chief of the Free Cities Allied Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこうあったんやけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「連合軍の長は各都市のしがらみのない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tradition is to appoint as leader of the allied force someone without ties to any of the cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵に就かせるというのが伝統でな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: usually a mercenary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺も剣ならともかく、政が絡む立場は御免でな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can handle a sword, but a political position is something I refuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いの事情が噛み合って、けっこうな事だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our situations have aligned well, which is quite fortunate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とまあ、当人がこの調子って事もあってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, considering how he is himself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は副隊長さんや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this time it's the deputy commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……」
「ピッテンだー！　やっほー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pitten! Hey there!"
